casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Respondent,
v.
Rong HE, Appellant. Motion No: 2018-403 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided April 26, 2018

***1039Motion for assignment of counsel granted and Paul Skip Laisure, Esq., Appellate Advocates, 111 John Street, 9th Floor, **501New York, NY 10038 assigned as *840counsel to the appellant on the appeal herein.
